product_description.product_use: Structural concretes and surface paving/flooring (Ultra Series Proyectado)
product_description.product_characteristics: High quality concrete and mortar with extraordinary capacity and great finishing
product_description.un_cpc_code: 375 Articles of concrete, cement and plaster
product_description.production_sites: All manufacturing plants of Holcim in Spain
product_description.production_capacity: Five cement factories in Spain with an installed capacity of seven million tons per year, 20 concrete plants, a mortar plant, a plant for alternative fuels preparation, four terminals and two distribution centers

lca_information.functional_unit: One m3 of ready-mix concrete/mortar fulfilling technical performance for construction with a reference service life of 100 years
lca_information.time_representativeness: Data inventory representative of regular annual production since March 2021; residual electricity mix from Spain 2021
lca_information.system_boundaries: Cradle to grave and Module D (A+B+C+D)
lca_information.cut_off_rules: Minimum 95% of total inflows (mass and energy) per module included; more than 99% inflows accounted for
lca_information.allocation_procedure: Allocation based on volume for energy, water consumption, and waste production
excluded_processes: Environmental impact from infrastructure, construction, production equipment, and tools not directly consumed
Personnel-related impacts such as transportation to/from work
lca_information.variation: Less than 10% inside product groups and sites

raw_materials.cement: ECOPlanet I/A 42.5N cement with 41% recycled cement

lca_information.hazardous_substances: No substances listed in Candidate List of SVHC used above 0.1% weight

additional_info.company_description: Holcim is a world leader in building materials and solutions with activities in cement, aggregate, concrete solutions and construction products. It aims to lead the industry towards reducing carbon emissions and low carbon construction with strong R&D.
additional_info.carbon_footprint_registry: Registered carbon footprint and CO2 absorption projects with the Ministerio para la Transiciôn Ecologica y el Reto Demogräfico de España for years 2016-2020
additional_info.circular_economy_commitment: Focus on waste reuse as resources, maximizing life cycle; Geocycle subsidiary pre-treats waste into fuel for clinker production
additional_info.quarry_restoration: Over 30 years of quarry restoration aiming for net positive biodiversity impact; recognized with European Business Awards for the Environment 2018 second prize in 'Company and Biodiversity' category
